pkgmetadata.longdescription: RobotPy meta package====================Easy to remember desktop installation for RobotPy! For more informationabout RobotPy, see the [documentation](https://robotpy.readthedocs.io).The instructions below work on a normal computer. For RoboRIO instructions,see [the documentatation](https://robotpy.readthedocs.io/en/stable/install/robot.html#install-robotpy).Install core RobotPy components-------------------------------On Windows:```py -3 -m pip install -U robotpy```On Linux/OSX:```pip3 install -U robotpy```Install optional RobotPy components-----------------------------------There are several categories of optional components that you can install. Thisuses the standard pip 'extras' installation functionality. The availablecategories are:* apriltag* commands2* cscore* ctre* navx* pathplannerlib* photonvision* playingwithfusion* rev* simThe following aren't available for 2023 yet:* romiLet's say that you wanted to install the latest version of the NavX softwarealong with command based programming. You would do this:On Windows:```py -3 -m pip install -U robotpy[navx,commands2]```On Linux/OSX:```pip3 install -U robotpy[navx,commands2]```Install all optional components-------------------------------There is a special 'all' category which will install the core componentsand all of the optional categories.On Windows:```py -3 -m pip install -U robotpy[all]```On Linux/OSX:```pip3 install -U robotpy[all]```
